title: Framerate Capped at 60 fps
body: My game normally runs at about 200-250 fps (I know you can't tell the difference much past 60 but it isn't as smooth if it isnt at least 100 for me). And I have an MSI GE72 Apache Pro, so my machine is no whimp. But recently no matter what I do I cannot get league to exceed 60 fps, it even feels like it's sluggish, I've reinstalled, repaired, did compatibility checks, and the like but nothing. My machine runs other games just fine and has a breeze doing so so I don't know what to do. I am running Windows 10.

replies.body:
Some recent Windows 10 updates pushed a new feature out to the Windows Game Bar called *Game DVR*. This feature has been causing FPS problems and game crashes, so I recommend disabling the game bar with [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if that resolved your issue.
